name: idea
content:
idea noun
(SUGGESTION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 [ C ] a suggestion or plan for doing something: have an idea I've had an idea - why don't we go to the coast?good idea "Let's go swimming." "That's a good idea!"idea for If you have any ideas for what I could buy Jack, let me know.the idea of That's when I first had the idea of starting (= planned to start) my own business. I like the idea of living in the countryside but I'm not sure I'd like the reality.bright idea She's full of bright (= good) ideas. [ + to infinitive ] It was Kate's idea to hire bikes.it is a good/bad idea to It's not a good idea to drive for hours without a rest.
